body_html: Apparently, you have system-wide install of nccl, but you don't have nccl.h in accessible location. How did you install nccl? If you installed runtime deb package, you'd also need to install dev package (https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl/releases/download/v1.3.4-1/libnccl-dev_1.3.4-1.cuda8.0_amd64.deb)

body: Apparently, you have system-wide install of nccl, but you don't have nccl.h in accessible location. How did you install nccl? If you installed runtime deb package, you'd also need to install dev package (https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl/releases/download/v1.3.4-1/libnccl-dev_1.3.4-1.cuda8.0_amd64.deb)
